channel.title: Kaitlyn Bristowe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Kaitlyn Bristowe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hulu’s Virgin Dating Show Is a Wild Concept, But “Sex Sells — or the Lack of It,” Say Kaitlyn Bristowe and Colton Underwood
item.description: The ‘Bachelor’ franchise alum and co-hosts open up about the outlandishness of new reality series ‘Are You My First?,’ and Underwood’s upcoming appearance on ‘The Traitors.’

item.title: Hulu’s Virgin Dating Show Is a Wild Concept, But “Sex Sells — or the Lack of It,” Say Kaitlyn Bristowe and Colton Underwood
item.description: The ‘Bachelor’ franchise alum and co-hosts open up about the outlandishness of new reality series ‘Are You My First?,’ and Underwood’s upcoming appearance on ‘The Traitors.’

item.title: ‘Are You My First?’ Reality Series Brings Together Virgins Searching for Love
item.description: Hulu’s new “dating experiment” comes from the producers of ‘Love Island,’ and is co-hosted by the first virgin Bachelor, Colton Underwood, along with former Bachelorette Kaitlyn Bristowe.

item.title: ‘Are You My First?’ Reality Series Brings Together Virgins Searching for Love
